targets.query: SELECT (("ms_per_write_op") + ("ms_per_read_op")) / 2 FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps01' AND $timeFilter

SELECT ("ms_per_read_op") FROM "performance" WHERE "type" = 'Pure' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "array"
SELECT ("ms_per_write_op") FROM "performance" WHERE "type" = 'Pure' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "array"
SELECT sum("queue_depth") FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("queue_depth") FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("reads_per_sec" + "writes_per_sec") FROM "performance" WHERE "type" = 'Pure' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "array"
SELECT ("output_per_sec" + "input_per_sec") FROM "performance" WHERE "type" = 'Pure' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "array"
